name: Entangle
description:
Tethered camera control & capture. Entangle provides a graphical interface for tethered shooting, aka taking photographs with a digital camera completely controlled from the computer. With a sufficiently capable digital SLR camera Entangle allows:
  • Trigger the shutter from the computer
  • Live preview of scene before shooting
  • Automatic download and display of photos as they are shot
  • Control of all camera settings from computer
